entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Wiarton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:42 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. High 15.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Local amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming east 20 late this afternoon. High 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then clearing. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 20 gusting to 50 this evening then becoming west 20 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
